Detailed Description

Abstract base class for GATI servers.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void GatiServer::Destroy (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Method will be called if the GatiSever has to be destroyed.

Implemented in AudioGatiServer.

virtual INT GatiServer::GetId (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns a unique ID for the server-type. The IDs 0 to 99 are reserved for APOXI GATI servers:

  • 0 ... MMI Simulator server
  • 1 ... Aragon server

Implemented in AudioGatiServer.

virtual void GatiServer::OnConnect (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Method will be called if a connection to a GatiClient has been etablished successfully.

Implemented in AudioGatiServer.

virtual void GatiServer::OnDataReceived (  UINT32  cmd,
UINT32  length,
void *  data
)  [pure virtual]
 

Method to react on incoming data (from the GatiClient to GatiServer).

Parameters:
cmd[in],: the command identifying the data.
length[in],: data length in number of bytes
data[in],: pointer to the buffer containing the received data

Implemented in AudioGatiServer.

virtual void GatiServer::OnDisconnect (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Method will be called if the connection to the GatiClient has been shut down or the connection was lost.

Implemented in AudioGatiServer.
